name: The Rosewood Masquerade
description: The Rosewood Masquerade is a game in which you control three unlikely protagonists as they make their way into the heart of the Rosewood estate to acquire the object of their desires - The Rose Diamond. It is filled with interesting puzzle mechanics centered around changing perspectives between the three main characters, and a healthy dose of industry witticism. We hope you will thoroughly enjoy your time - don your mask, you have a diamond to heist.
